channel.title: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)
channel.description:
I am using an Iframe for my sidebar. It blends in perfectly and works perfectly when I use Mozilla Firefox, but when I use Internet Explorer it dont blend in with the template.
Here is an example of it - http://gamerz-elite.com/example/ (try it with Mozilla and Internet Explorer)
Can someone please tell me how to fix this?

item.title: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

lol, I edited smf so it will only support FF well, if you try any other browser it is slow, and looks messed up, http://xline.kloplop321.com it is an old forum, test in both IE and FF

Read full topic

item.source: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)

item.title: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

usually the main index is a frame-set when it comes to frame. html, here is an example:

the index:
[php]

Untitled Document [/php]

the top bar, top.html

[php]

Untitled Document Here is the top bar, usefull for INSTANT-NEWS! [/php]

here is the side bar, sidebar.html :
[php]

Untitled Document

This is a sidebar, can hold links and stuff.

page: 1

page: 2

[/php]

Here is the main body frame, 1, body1.html:
[php]

Untitled Document This is the main body frame [/php]

here is the second body frame, body2.html :
[php]

Untitled Document
This is the second body page.
[/php]

A live version can be displayed at http://kloplop321.doesntexist.org/frame/
or you can just not use iframes lol

Read full topic
item.source: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)

item.title: Iframe Problem (works with mozilla but not internet explorer)
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

not for me of FF

[quote=“Gtech Warriors, post:6, topic:88426”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=129454.msg1255527#msg1255527 date=1178160232]
have a look at your iframe which i think is http://gamerz-elite.com/example/sidebar.html it looks like example two get it to look like no 1 then iframe it
[/quote]

umm its exactly like no 1, but for some reason it wont show up the same on internet explorer… and i cant make it do that…

and how would i use frames?[/quote]

Read full topic
